text: You won’t be able to add drag-and-drop capabilities to a custom-coded email template — that’s not currently supported. If possible, I’d suggest making your header and footer into custom modules that you can then add to emails via the drag-and-drop builder.
Can I custom-code the headers and footers or do I just have to try to make it match?

Custom modules allow you to create little, reusable instances of custom code that you can insert via the drag-and-drop builder — you’d be completely free to write whatever markup you want and then place that code into an email that’s otherwise built via drag-and-drop.

There is one significant caveat for emails, however; you’re not able to write styles to the email’s `<head>`, so you’ll be limited to inline styles. For anything that would require media queries, you’ll have to reverse-engineer and reuse the classes that HS uses for the drag-and-drop grid.
